resources.string: The input is invalid, please try again
The name contains an invalid character: "%s"
The value is too small, it must be at least %s
The value is too big, it can be at most %s
Are you sure you want to exit?
Are you sure you want to force close?
The available memory (%d) is lower than the allocated memory (%d), which may cause the game to crash. If the game crashes, please change the configuration!
The available free memory space (%d) is lower than the allocated memory (%d), which will cause a crash. If the game crashes, please adjust the memory allocation.
Tasks are being executed, please wait
Failed to download Minecraft! This may be due to poor network connection, incorrect file placement, etc.
Gyro control needs to be enabled first to use!
Your actions are too frequent, please try again later
Zalith Launcher requires external storage, please reconnect and restart the software

The game version manifest on the mirror does not match the official Mojang version manifest, which means it may have been tampered with.
This is not safe. Your personal information may be at risk if you continue.
If you still want to use the mirror, press \"Turn off manifest checks\" and start the download again.
If you want to use the official download source, press \"Switch to official site\" and start the download again.
Turn off game version list checks
The game is ready to launch

Zalith Launcher requires notification permission to prevent game file downloads from stopping when you leave the app. Without this permission, Android may stop your download progress when Zalith Launcher is in the background.
You can change your mind at any time by going to \"System Settings\"
Executing .jar feature is incompatible with Java %d
Tap the gear icon to open the menu ⚙\nTap a button to customize: edit, resize, delete, or remap
This control layout has no description…
This is the default control layout file. Click to manipulate this layout.
Are you sure you want to set this control layout as the default?
There are no control layouts here. Restarting the app will generate a new default layout.
File is being verified, please try again later…
Name is invalid or file already exists
A version with this name already exists!
No versions available to choose from!
The additional content has been selected, and the independence of the original core must be ensured. Please do not use the original name!
Download and install as a version
Download and install as a Mod
Some versions of OptiFine may not work on Forge, and if you encounter crashes or compatibility issues, consider removing OptiFine first!

If version isolation is enabled, your game saves, resource packs, mods, and other important resources will be deleted along with the version. Please make sure to back up your data before performing this operation!
The current version is missing the version JSON file and is therefore considered an invalid version. You cannot select this version. Click Confirm to delete this erroneous version.
Task in progress, version management is temporarily unavailable
Zalith Launcher requires permission to manage all files on the device to use this feature properly. Please enable the permission!

Zalith Launcher requires storage management permission. If the permission is not enabled, it may cause issues such as game files failing to save or decompress properly. Please grant the permission to ensure proper functionality.
The launcher will delete this path, but will not delete the files saved within it. You can still re-add this path after deletion.
This will reset the custom icon you set, and the operation is irreversible. Are you sure you want to reset the version icon?
This account will be removed from the launcher, are you sure you want to do this?

Your Microsoft account login information seems to be expired, this often happens after the account password is changed. Please remove the current account and log in again to reset your login information.

A valid username only supports English letters (case-insensitive), numbers, and underscores. The length must be between 3 and 16 characters.
Examples of correct usernames: Name, Name_, Name123
Examples of incorrect usernames: Name@, N ame, name_name_name_name
However, if you are using relevant Mods or plugins that can bypass this restriction, you may continue using this name. Otherwise, please rename it!
Please log in with at least one Minecraft premium account, we do not encourage launching Minecraft without a premium account.
It seems you are not logged in with a premium account! Offline accounts are a backup solution for players who cannot connect to the internet, not for players without a premium account.
It seems you are not logged in with a premium account! Are you sure you want to use third-party login without logging in with a premium account?
If you do not have a Minecraft account, please purchase one on the Minecraft official website first!
It seems you don\'t have an Xbox Live account
Adult verification required for your account
Your account is a child account, it needs to be added to a family to log in
Xbox Live is not available in your country/region
Please ensure you have purchased Minecraft, log in to your account on https://minecraft.net/ and try again
Within the execution environment, please try to use JRE 8 to ensure stability
You must have at least one Java Runtime Environment installed
No compatible Java Runtime Environment found, this version requires Java %d or later
Java 8 not found, to use this option, you must install Java 8
Open the virtual mouse management interface, where you can add your favorite virtual mouse icons and use them
The currently selected virtual mouse is the default virtual mouse, sharing, renaming, and deleting operations are not supported
Open the launcher background icon management interface, where you can add your favorite background images and set different backgrounds for different interfaces
Click the \"Select\" button to set this image as the background for %s
There are no background images here, please add some first!
Please select a file with the suffix %s
This folder (or file) does not exist
Please select the operation you want to perform on this file
Please select the operation you want to perform on this folder
Are you sure you want to delete this file?
Are you sure you want to delete this folder?
When deleting a folder, all files inside this folder will be deleted as well. If this folder contains important files, please cancel this operation!
Are you sure you want to delete the selected items?
This operation will permanently delete all selected items, please proceed with caution!
File name conflicts with an existing file!
Currently selected a total of %d items
Ignore the notch and extend screen content to full screen for a more complete immersive experience
Allows adjusting the game\'s resolution, with native resolution set to 100%
May help improve performance on devices limited by GPU capabilities
Limits peak performance to prevent overheating and throttling
Limits peak performance to prevent overheating and throttling
Allows the launcher to use internal system APIs to enable V-Sync for Zink
Forces the launcher to use the system Vulkan driver on Adreno GPUs instead of Turnip, only affects Zink and mods using Vulkan
Change the delay for triggering long press actions like breaking blocks or dropping items
If the buttons are too small, you can enlarge them
Modify the size of the virtual mouse
Modify the movement speed of the virtual mouse
Show Virtual Mouse by Default on Game Start
When this option is enabled, the virtual mouse will appear on startup
Disable gestures such as long press to break blocks, tap to place blocks
Disable Double Tap to Swap Items
Disable double tapping an item in the hotbar to swap it with the off-hand item
Use All Caps in Button Labels
Disable this if you want to use lowercase letters in the control layout
Enabling this will allow you to rotate the camera in-game by rotating your device
Adjust the sensitivity of gyroscope control
Increase this value if you experience performance issues with gyroscope control
Allows you to modify the keyboard keys bound to each controller button
Allows you to remap controller buttons
Increase this option if the joystick drifts
Additional JVM arguments added when launching Minecraft. It is not recommended to modify this without confidence, as it may cause the game to crash
Control how much memory is allocated to Minecraft
The memory space set currently exceeds the available memory size
Whether to enable the sandbox security manager when executing .jar files
This option forces the launcher to check the libraries when the hash is available, preventing download errors
Logs converted shaders to a log file
Force Renderer to Run on Big Core
Forces the Minecraft rendering thread to run on the highest frequency core
When enabled, the launcher will check the game version list and libraries
When enabled, the launcher will cache the cover images and screenshots of resources for faster loading next time
Choose a mirror download source instead of using the official download source
When installing a new version, should version isolation be selected by default?
Automatically set the game language to the selected language when the game starts
Ignore the language set in the game and force it to be the language set in the launcher
Open Log Output When Launching Game
Enable the log output interface when the application officially starts the game
Set whether to play animations when switching interfaces in the launcher
Set the speed of animations in the launcher
Set the opacity of the main pages in the launcher
Whether to quit the launcher when the application officially starts the game
Click to re-request notification permissions, which are necessary for the normal background download of game files
Real-time display of memory information on the game menu floating window. This option can be toggled quickly by long-pressing the game menu floating window
You can customize this prefix text according to your needs
Game Menu Floating Window Initial Position
Set the opacity of the game menu floating window
This setting has been changed, but requires the app to be restarted to take effect!
The launcher detected that your device has an Adreno GPU. Enabling this option may cause the Zink renderer to malfunction. Are you sure you want to enable this option?
The application/game aborted due to fatal signal %d.
For details on the error, please check the log file or crash report. If you can\'t solve the issue on your own, please send the log file or crash report to someone who can help you resolve it!
Please don\'t just take a screenshot of the current app interface; otherwise, no one will know what happened. Share your log file or crash report!
No suitable runtime environment found, set to the runtime environment selected for the current version
The game is currently running. You can enable log output via the menu to check the game\'s status.
The current platform does not support downloading this type of resource, or does not support this category filter!
Please download the corresponding dependency Mods as needed. Missing necessary dependency Mods will cause the game to fail to run!
Unable to recognize file structure, automatic unpacking failed, please handle the file manually!
Please select a modpack file that the launcher supports importing!
This file is not supported by the launcher!
Check and clean up the app\'s cache files. Clearing cache files does not affect the normal use of the app.
Cleaning complete. A total of %s of cache files were cleared this time.
Get and update to the latest version
The current version is the latest.
Network error, unable to check for updates at the moment!
Network error, unable to check for updates at the moment! Error code: %d
The latest installation package has been downloaded. Do you want to install it? Package location:
Please select the type of authentication server
Please enter the Yggdrasil API authentication server address
Server cannot be empty, please check the authentication server settings!
Multiple roles exist for the current account, please select the role you want to use
No account? Click here to register one!

The launcher needs to install these contents to ensure Minecraft can start properly. These contents are included in the app and need to be extracted before they can be used. Click the button below to start extracting and updating these contents.
The launcher is extracting these contents. The main interface will automatically open after extraction is complete. Please wait patiently.
Lightweight Java Game Library, Minecraft relies on it to run the game.
Provides a portable GUI backend for OpenJDK.
Injects authlib via runtime to enable login outside the game.
This library implements a custom Java security manager and a security policy with deny rules.
Helps automatically install Forge, Fabric, and OptiFine.
Java 8 environment, Minecraft 1.16- depends on Java 8.
Java 17 environment, Minecraft 1.17+ depends on Java 17.
Java 21 environment, Minecraft 1.20.5+ depends on Java 21.
Zalith Launcher is a Minecraft launcher developed based on PojavLauncher, capable of running Minecraft: Java Edition on Android devices.

Zalith Launcher is dedicated to optimizing user experience, redesigning the application interface, and adding more practical features, aiming to lower the barriers to play as much as possible, allowing more people to easily enjoy the fun of Minecraft.

Zalith Launcher is licensed under the GPL 3.0 open source license, which has a "viral" nature; any code that uses, modifies, or derives from GPL libraries or software must also be open-sourced under the GPL license. If you intend to distribute or share this software, please make sure to comply with the relevant provisions of the GPL 3.0 open source license.
The following are all the sponsors who support the development, thank you very much!
The development team of PojavLauncher, who developed and open-sourced PojavLauncher
The launcher uses Mod and modpack Chinese translations from MC Wiki
Provided technical support for rendering in the launcher
Provided technical support for the launcher
Provided technical support for the launcher and fixed some bugs
The launcher uses the BMCLAPI mirror source created by them
Click this button to close and return to the previous interface.
Click this button to refresh the current content.
When there are too many control layouts, click this button to summon a search box and use it to search for the desired control layout!
Click to open Android\'s file manager, select your control layout file, and import it into the launcher!
Click this button to quickly create a new control layout!
Click this button to quickly reset the background image of the currently selected interface.
Click to open Android\'s file manager, select your background image file, and import it into the launcher!
Click to open the native file manager, select your virtual mouse image file, and import it into the launcher!
Want to quickly search for files? Click this button to summon a search box and use it to search for files.
Click to open Android\'s file manager, select the file you want to import, and import it into the launcher!
Click this button to create a new folder in the current directory.
Click to confirm this directory as the selection.
Click to summon a search box and use it to quickly find the Mod you\'re looking for.
Select a Mod file in the native file manager to import it into the current Mod folder.
Click to enter the Mod download page where you can search and download Mods online.

Most of the content in this software is developed and maintained by me alone. If you find this software helpful and are in a position to do so, I hope you will consider sponsoring me to give me more motivation to continue developing and improving it. Thank you for your support!
